description:
OddsAndEvens.andTheWinnerIs() (shared/front_running/odds_and_evens.sol#34-46) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- res = players[0].addr.send(1800000000000000000) (shared/front_running/odds_and_evens.sol#38)
	- res = players[1].addr.send(1800000000000000000) (shared/front_running/odds_and_evens.sol#41)
